code: import React from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE;export default function Checklist(_ref){let{tasks,refresh}=_ref;const toggleTask=async taskId=>{try{await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/tasks/toggle"),{id:taskId});refresh();}catch(err){console.error("Failed to toggle task:",err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checklist",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Tasks"}),tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:task.completed,onChange:()=>toggleTask(task.id)}),task.name," (",task.person,")"]},task.id))]});}
